extendedInfo.description: Make your homeThis is a free game, a free jigsaw puzzle pictures are carefully edited selection rules of the game, pictures were randomly shuffled through moving pictures to splice into a complete image, each level has steps and time statistics, the picture is finished stitching can preview the entire picture, and you can make phone wallpaper, uppermost in the game with game tips, and display the full diagramsGame Features:Multiple difficulty levels (from easiest 3 * 3 to hardest 8 * 8).- Set as wallpaper feature.- Save to SD feature.- Images gallery and manual difficulty selectionTips:Home, Room, Living Room, Kitchen , Wall Decorating, Bathroom, Interior, Houzz, puzzle,Buildings, Floor designsAll our applications are free and ad supported. This explains the permissions. More games are coming, if you have any feedback, please mail me, thanks & enjoy!
